column4: you wouldn't happen to know anything about making a live usb require a user with a password would you? I tried making a user earlier, with a password, but gdm kicked me out for not being in the "nopassword" group. Longshot, but I remember you being knowledgeable :)
unless you set it somewhere in usb creator, i've got no idea
course, you could always sudo adduser <user> nopassword, but i'm not sure if that would be permanent
quickest solution will probably be reboot
